title: (x) Land Rover header font - Foundry Monoline {Akira}
content:
Hi there,  
Could anyone please ID this for me? It's the font that Land Rover use as the titles for things on their website, and also for titles/headers on leaflets etc...

Thanks in advance.

Jack

[http://www.landrover.co.uk/gb/en/vehicles/range-rover/overview.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20111014224052/http:/www.landrover.co.uk/gb/en/vehicles/range-rover/overview.htm "http://www.landrover.co.uk/gb/en/vehicles/range-rover/overview.htm")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111014224052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_4355.JPG)
author: jtfearnley

comments.content:
Wow, thanks for such a quick reply, sorry but do you have any idea where I could get this font please?

Or would I have to request it from their website?
Yepp, request it from their website. Not very userfriendly but exclusive.
